file_content.text: Stay back! Stop talking. You're not real. None of you.
Calm down--we're plenty real.
You... no. There's no hope. He won't be silent. He puts words in me.
You still hear the Emperor's voice? What's he telling you to do?
Tell us what's happening.
Come with us. We can teach you how to defy his will.
We will help you.
The Emperor's gone, Suri. He can't control you.
The Emperor's dead. If you hear his voice, it's because you're crazy.
You've lost your mind.
Not helpful. Talk to me, Suri.
He wants me to flee? No--attack. Set fire to Ord Mantell. Wait, that's wrong. Freeze the oceans of Manaan.
Changing commands. Which are lies? What is truth? Can't live like this. Help me. Kill me.
Death isn't the answer. We'll find another way.
We won't hurt you.
No other path. Death brings silence.
Ignore the Emperor. Follow the sound of my voice. Only my voice. Let me lead you.
Listen to me. Obey me.
Your voice. Only yours. Yes, Master. Take my weapon. Strike me down.
This isn't what happened to us, Kira. Maybe she can't be freed.
It may be the only way.
He can't follow me into death. He can't.
Enough! Leave us, Jedi. She is our sister. We will make her whole again.
What makes you the expert, Sith?
Explain how.
Tell me who you are, and I'll consider it.
Identify yourself.
Don't. I remember Tannac. He's vermin.
She's not going back to Korriban.
No, you won't.
Be smart. Leave while you still have legs.
We are Children of the Emperor, like her. We understand what it means to be severed from him.
With our assistance, she will regain control. Without it, she'll die. There's nothing you can do.
Nice story. Got a better one: We take her to Tython and she gets real help.
We can free Suri from the Emperor's will.
Exactly.
Loyalty to the Emperor is forever--and she does not want to be free.
This may not be something the Jedi can repair. We don't want to be responsible for her death.
What if they're right?
They'll say anything to stop her from leaving with us.
She's coming with us. But before we leave, we'll reduce the surplus population of annoying Sith.
Plus, these fools die.
Kill me, and you condemn her.
Tell the Jedi how you summoned me. You begged for my help.
I... yes. He'll rearrange the words. They won't hurt anymore. I'll be silent.
Kira, if this is the only solution, we shouldn't interfere.
Go with him, then.
Last chance. You can still come with us.
I'm going home. It's quiet there.
What the plan? Let her go with them, or fight it out?
It's your call, Kira.
Blast, I hate this. My gut says let her go.
A wise choice. Come along, Suri.
Things would've gone bad if we'd pushed them. This way, we get another chance to bring Suri around.
I didn't like this any more than you. At least now we know the Children of the Emperor are still a problem.
I hope so.
I never gave up on you. We won't give up on your friend either.
Next time, my love.
Keep that up, you're gonna make me cry. Nobody wants that.
I wish the Jedi Council could see you right now.
Well done, Kira.
They will. I recorded the whole thing. People need to know the Children of the Emperor are still a problem.
The Emperor's hold on his people outlived him. The next time we see your friend, we'll have to kill her.
That's doubtful.
Voss gives me the creeps. Let's get off this rock.
Your story changes every two seconds. I agreed to take you back to the Jedi--not hand you over to the Sith.
That's not happening.
They want to take you from us, Suri. Will you let them, or fight?
Don't listen to him. We can help you.
No! No more voices!
